      • getNextCandidate

        public int getNextCandidate()
        Description copied from class: ReductionHeuristic
        Is used by the reduction agent steered by this heuristic to poll reduction candidates. This is the main interface for defining a heuristic, and it may depend on arbitrarily complex internal calculations. This method is abstract, so that every heuristic needs to implement it.
        Specified by:
        getNextCandidate in class ReductionHeuristic
        Returns:
        the next reduction candidate to be tried, -1 to terminate.

        Description copied from class: ReductionHeuristic

        Returns:
